text: Emma Lewis (1931–2013) was an Native American potter from the Acoma Pueblo. She was the daughter of the potter Lucy M. Lewis. Her work is included in the collections of the Seattle Art Museum,http://art.seattleartmuseum.org/people/5659/emma-lewis the Peabody Museum of Archaeology and Ethnology and the Brooklyn Museum. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2013 deaths Category:20th-century American women artists Category:21st-century American women artists Category:Native American artists
title: Emma Lewis
